original: Lindahl, Albin Theodor, kamrer, skådespelare, Göteborg, f. 4/4/82 i Sthlm av kamrer Hjalmar L. o. Maria Sundbeck. G. 12 m. Anna-Lisa Hellström. Barn: Ann-Mari, skådesp :a v. Gbgs stadsteater, g. m. dek :mål. Carl Johan Ström, Gbg, Tom, regissör o. ledare f. Lisebergs ungd :verksamh. — Lärov:stud. Debut. v. Bror Olssons sällsk. 00, eng. h. Carl Deurell 01-03, v. Östermalmsteat. 03-04, tre säsonger i landsorten, v. Dramat, teat. 07-10, h. Alb. Ranft, t. Stadsteat. i Hälsingborg 23, t. Lorensbergsteat. 26, numera skådesp. o. kamrer v. Gbgs stadsteater. Sekr. i Sv. skådesp ifören., rev. o. förtr:man f. Sv. teaterförb., ordf. i moderlogen f. TSO i Gbg. Bl. roller: Armand i Kameliadamen, Ambrosius, Turman i Geografi o. kärlek, Kung Charles i Diktatorn. Därjämte uppskattad Bellmanssångare. RVO, Patr-stGM.
translated:
Lindahl, Albin Theodor, accountant, actor, Gothenburg, born on April 4, 1882 in Stockholm to accountant Hjalmar L. and Maria Sundbeck. Married on December 12 with Anna-Lisa Hellström. Children: Ann-Mari, actress at Gothenburg City Theatre, married to decorator Carl Johan Ström from Gothenburg, Tom, director and leader of Liseberg Youth Activities. 

Education: Studied at a secondary school. Made his debut with Bror Olsson's company in 1900, worked with Carl Deurell from 1901 to 1903, Östermalm Theatre from 1903 to 1904, three seasons in rural areas, Dramaten Theatre from 1907 to 1910, under Albert Ranft at Helsingborg City Theatre in 1923, Lorensberg Theatre in 1926, currently working as an actor and accountant at Gothenburg City Theatre. Secretary of the Swedish Actors Association, member and honorary chairman of the Swedish Theatre Association, chairman of the TSO mother lodge in Gothenburg. Notable roles: Armand in "Camille", Ambrosius, Turman in "Geography and Love", King Charles in "The Dictator". Also appreciated as a singer of Bellman songs. Received the Royal Order of Vasa, Knight of the Patriotic Grand Master.

structured.name: Albin Theodor Lindahl

occupation.name: Director, leader of Liseberg Youth Activities

awards: Knight of the Patriotic Grand Master
